shopifyCollection.title: Other Fun Stuff!
shopifyCollection.description: Random cool things that we designed, but didn’t have to cut or sew. Pint glasses, stickers, magnets, even a puzzle, because why not!
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Random cool things that we designed, but didn’t have to cut or sew. Pint glasses, stickers, magnets, even a puzzle, because why not!

products.title: Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle • Galison x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: The Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Puzzle in Square Box from features a collage of colorful pendants each with celebratory messages. Galison puzzles are packaged in matte-finish sturdy boxes, perfect for gifting, reuse, and storage. - Puzzle Size: 27 x 20", 686 x 508mm - Box Size: 8 x 8 x 1.5", 203 x 203 x 41mm - 1000 Pieces, Ribbon Cut - Includes Puzzle Insert with Full Puzzle Image - Minimal Puzzle Dust
products.descriptionHtml:
The Celebrate Everything 1000 Piece Puzzle in Square Box from features a collage of colorful pendants each with celebratory messages. Galison puzzles are packaged in matte-finish sturdy boxes, perfect for gifting, reuse, and storage.

- Puzzle Size: 27 x 20", 686 x 508mm 

- Box Size: 8 x 8 x 1.5", 203 x 203 x 41mm

- 1000 Pieces, Ribbon Cut

- Includes Puzzle Insert with Full Puzzle Image

- Minimal Puzzle Dust

products.title: Gift Card
products.description: Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with an Oxford Pennant gift card. Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.
products.descriptionHtml:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with an Oxford Pennant gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

products.title: Yes You Can Sticker • Kelle Hampton x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: This item is part of a collaboration with Kelle Hampton, a New York Times Bestselling Author. Kelle’s book, Bloom, is a story about her relationship with her daughter Nella, who was born with Down syndrome. A portion of all proceeds benefit Ruby’s Rainbow, a charity who supports adults with Down syndrome seeking higher education. Size: 4" x 4"
products.descriptionHtml:

products.title: Celebrate Everything Notecard Set • Galison x Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: The Celebrate Everything Notecard Set from Galison contains a mashup of folded and flat card sizes featuring colorful art and a set of messages for different occasions. Included in this notecard set are the positive messages “You are Magnificent,” “Yes You Can,” “Better Together,” and more. - 6 Designs, 2 Each - Multiple Flat & Folded Card Sizes - Envelope with printed flap - Box Size: 5.375 x 8 x 1.125”, 136 x 203 x 28 mm - Designs by Oxford Pennant
products.descriptionHtml:
The Celebrate Everything Notecard Set from Galison contains a mashup of folded and flat card sizes featuring colorful art and a set of messages for different occasions.

Included in this notecard set are the positive messages “You are Magnificent,” “Yes You Can,” “Better Together,” and more.

- 6 Designs, 2 Each

- Multiple Flat & Folded Card Sizes

- Envelope with printed flap

- Box Size: 5.375 x 8 x 1.125”, 136 x 203 x 28 mm

- Designs by Oxford Pennant
